events.title: Christmas Bazaar
events.description: Visit the Christmas Bazaar at Royal Canadian Legion Branch #643, 110 Jutland Road, Etobicoke on Saturday November 29th, 2025 from 9am-2pm. Baked Goods, Jewellery, Books, Previously Loved Treasures, and More! Organized by the Branch #643 Ladies Auxiliary.

events.title: Friday Night Karaoke
events.description: Come out and enjoy a fun night of Karaoke at Royal Canadian Legion Branch #643, 110 Jutland Road, Etobicoke. Fridays 7pm to 11pm. October 03, 10, 17, 24, and 31 and November 07, 14, 21, and 28. Enjoy dinner before the show - kitchen open 1pm to 7pm.

events.title: Labour Day Celebration
events.description: Free entertainment featuring DJ Bruce Graham from 1:00pm - 5:00pm. BBQ Hamburgers, Hot Dogs, and Sausages available for purchase between 1:00pm-3:30pm. Doors open at 12:30pm.

events.title: D-Day Memorial
events.description: D-Day and the Battle of Normandy Annual Parade and Memorial Service Sunday June 1, 2025.

events.title: May Dinner and Dance
events.description: Tickets are 25$, available at the Clubroom Bar.

events.title: General Meeting
events.description: Come out and support your branch.

events.title: King Charlges III Coronation Medal Ceremony
events.description: Congratulations to Branch President Donna Sampson and Branch First Vice President William Law on being presented with the King Charles III Coronation medal by MP James Maloney before a full house at Branch 643 on March 4th.

events.title: Remembrance Day 2024
events.description: Branch 643 welcomed members from the public and local elementary students to our 2024 Remembrance Day service.
